ygData.subject: Re: Re[2]: Monks role:
ygData.msgSnippet: and the other person was right.  I didnt say I thought we were going to get snare, just that given all the spells out there, that would be the one spell I
ygData.messageBody:
and the other person was right. I didnt say I thought we were going to
get snare, just that given all the spells out there, that would be the one
spell I would want most.

I fought with a lvl 21 rogue the other day who had som e expensive dagger
that proced either root or snare.

On Thu, 20 Jan 2000, Sheldon Jolson wrote:

> From: "Sheldon Jolson" <Sheldon_Jolson@...>
>
>
>
> Under this logic, why would a melee class such as a rogue
> or a warrior get weapons that proc darkness or DoT or even
> DD spells? We have treant fists. There must be a reason
> they're called treant fists. There are no treants involved in
> the quest!
>
>
> From: imari_dellimore@...
>
> Just to clarify:
> " snaring glove or 1h blunt weapon would be an unlikely development."
> What I meant was a "glove that proced snare" or a "1hb weapon that proced snare"
> would be an unlikely development - regardless of whether they are plane dropped
> or norrath found. That monk only one hand blunt weapons are coming is something
> I believe I was one of the first to announce on this list and am "reasonably"
> sure that they will be an eventuality (reasonably because until verant puts them
> in the game you NEVER can tell what those guys will do)
>
> Insummary : we agree that 1hblunt weapons are coming.
> I strongly disagree that snaring weapons (gloves/blunt weapons) will
> ever be useable by any class that does not already have a snare or slowing
> spell: druid ranger shaman etc)
>
>
> ____________________Reply Separator____________________
> Subject: Re: [EQ-Monks] Monks role:
> Author: "Tim Perkins" <tperkins@...>
> Date: 01/20/2000 9:44 AM
>
> From: "Tim Perkins" <tperkins@...>
>
> Imari,
>
> The orignal person said just for fun what proc would you like to see and of
> course thats what people want. 1hb weapons will be introduced into the game
> of that I have no doubt as Gorden has already said we should practice our
> 1hb skills. I also think if and when a glove such as that became avaiable
> just as with the 1hb weapons they will most likely come from the planes.
>
> Kizmet Bayashi
> Monk of the 48th..
> E-Marr
> Da`Kor
>
>
> ----- Original Message -----
> From: <imari_dellimore@...>
> To: RaceFace <bean@...>; <EQ-Monks@onelist.com>
> Sent: Thursday, January 20, 2000 6:25 AM
> Subject: [EQ-Monks] Monks role:
>
>
> > From: imari_dellimore@...
> >
> > A snaring glove or 1h blunt weapon would be an unlikely development.
> Monks role
> > in a group is to do massive melee damge (reducing the load on the casters
> mana
> > at high levels). To give us snare would weaken the ranger/druid role from
> the
> > group some. Snare would be AWSOME, but it would mean we monks become to
> > powerful. able to solo in dungeons and area we were never meant to solo.
> >
> > While on the subject of monk items:
> > I have a question for all of you who did the treant fist quest.
> > I have spent about 15hours (total in two marathon sessions) camping for
> the
> > humorous handheld mace off the alchemist in the Xorb gorge. I have
> killed the
> > two goblin guards there till I am blue in the face. Nothing has made that
> > alchemist spawn. Is there a trick to doing so? Last night I spent about
> 10
> > hours at it (and I picked up the camp from a guy who had been there for 4
> hours
> > before me and had to go to bed) So if you think about it in 14 hours of
> > non-stop camping he never showed. Anyone who has done the quest can help
> me out
> > with some advice? I thought this guy was a 8-10 hour spawn?
> >
> >
> > ____________________Reply Separator____________________
> > Subject: Re: [EQ-Monks] Patch day is this wednesday!
> > Author: "RaceFace" <bean@...>
> > Date: 01/18/2000 8:04 PM
> >
> > From: "RaceFace" <bean@...>
> >
> > Snare would be great. Stun would be nice too.
> >
> > Perhaps ones that proc some sort of flame-based or force-based DoT.
> "target
> > is slammed by an intense force" or something like that. Think of it as
> the
> > monk focussing his ki into an attack.
> >
> > -Raean Bloodyhands, 24th monk, Tunare.
> >
> > > From: "Dizzy J." <dizzyj@...>
> > > for fun, what would you want something to proc? personally, I really
> wish
> > > I had a good mid lvl set of gloves that proced snare. most usefull
> spell
> > > in the game imho. then I could solo in dungeons that most people dont
> go
> > > into..upper guk, runnyeye, sola..etc.
> >
> >
> >
> >
